title: Need help.
body:
I am going to link a league account to my email, but I have a question. If an account related to the email is banned, will all other accounts connected to it be banned to? This question is because the email has a previous account banned for "third party programs" (we all know what that means), and I want to connect a new account to it. 

Now before I continue the discussion, this is not the account (obviously) and I don't want any "haters" saying " Wow script f*g, get outta league f**ktard" Yes. I admit to scripting. Not on this account. It's barely level 12 or some sh*t, lol. But I want to know that if I associate an email with a banned account, will it get banned, flagged, or can I not connect 2 accounts to one email?

replies.body: Nope, you'll be fine using the same email address.  Even if an account is suspended, we're usually okay with players making a new account.  I hope that helps!
